Begin the day with a jolt of freshness with Dove Men+Care Fresh Awake Antiperspirant. This strong antiperspirant deodorant for men delivers up to 48 hours of powerful protection against odor and sweat while powering you through the day with an energizing scent. As part of the Dove Men+Care range, this antiperspirant deodorant for men combines powerful 48-hour protection with ¼ moisturizer technology. Combining the strength of 48 hour powerful antiperspirant protection with Dove ¼ moisturizer technology, Dove Men+Care Fresh Awake Antiperspirant combats sweat and odor all day long while being gentle on skin. Now you can enjoy up to 48 hours of protection against sweat and body odor with the energizing scent of Dove Men+Care Fresh Awake Antiperspirant.
